name: The Exchange Student: Episode 1 - First Day in Sweden!
name_original: The Exchange Student: Episode 1 - First Day in Sweden!
description:
The Exchange Student: Episode 1 - First Day in Sweden! is an adventure game developed by Pan Metron Ariston. It was originally released in 2006. It was published by Pan Metron Ariston.
The Exchange Student: Episode 1 - First Day in Sweden! is available on PC.
